response.overview: The world’s top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Court of Justice. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.
response.tagline: Everyone's out to get them... If they don't kill each other first.
response.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard

titles.title: ヒットマンズ・ボディガード：2017
